Content.title: Adz
Content.name: Adz
Content.bodyText:
Another vote for del.icio.us - I used to use Foxmarks but found delicious to be much better.  Firebug is excellent, as is the Google notifer (but on OSX there are other, non FF replacements - Twitter(iffic) and Google Notifier in the menubar).

I also recommend AdBlock.

But for Umbraco users - "Its all Text!" is fantastic.  It allows you to edit text on a web page using your favourite editor.
So for example, if editing CSS or XSLT in Umbraco on Windows, you would right-click and open the text in Visual Studio, edit in Visual Studio, then save it back to Umbraco.
Try it - https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/4125
